mapper.insert: insert into adboard (adb_title, adb_content, user_id ,ad_category) values (#{adb_title}, #{adb_content}, #{user_id}, #{ad_category})
mapper.select: select adb_title, adb_content, ad_category, adb_cdate from adboard where adb_num = #{adbNum}

select adb_num, adb_title, ad_category, adb_cdate, adb_content from adboard where 1=1
and (ad_category like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or adb_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or adb_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
order by adb_cdate desc
